Audience of fundraiser¶

Admin¶

Privileges
  • Add new users or remove existing ones
  • Approve users to access all features of the platform
  • Add new books and sites

Admin profile page

Beneficiary¶

Privileges
  • Start any number of campaigns

Beneficiary profile page

Donor¶

Privileges
  • Donate to any campaigns

Donor profile page
